welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Carvin, where the charming French countryside meets rich cultural heritage. From its quaint streets to its famous cheese markets, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's unique charm and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, mainly used for domestic flights within France.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
